name: Humbug
summary:
Humbug is puzzle platform game, where the rules of logic don’t count.

Your main object is to break into the castle, secondary object is to get out.
info:
• 中文名: 坑爹诈骗犯
  • 别名: 坑爸诈骗犯
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游戏引擎: Flash
  • 官方网站: http://pixelcontinuous.com/2011/06/humbug/
  • 制作: PixelContinuous
